main.name: SIDHARTH RAO
main.bio: Hi! I'm a Senior at Choate Rosemary Hall, a High School located in Wallingford, Connecticut. I'm interested in Computer Science, AI, Engineering, Cybersecurity, and Programming, mainly in Python. At school, I am the Lead Programmer, and Lead Technician on Choate's FRC robotics team (Wired Boars 7407) and am part of the Advanced Robotics Concentration signature program. I'm a cello player in Choate's Concert Orchestra, and outside of classes, I am the President of the Choate Aerospace Association. I volunteer at Robotics and Beyond, where I teach students Python, Machine Learning, and Edge Computing. In my free time, I mess around with Rubik's cubes, learn card magic and coin tricks, develop automated scripts for me to use in my daily life, and customize my personal Arch Linux based distro.
main.contactmessage: Please contact me if you have any questions or just want to reach out!

work.title: Cognite
work.description: Programmed and integrated payloads for Boston Dynamics Spot robot for use in Exxon Mobil's refineries. Demoed product to Exxon client team onsite. Used Python, Docker, BD Spot SDK, Javascript, Ubuntu servers, and a variety of other tools.

work.title: Rovicare AI
work.description: Created a Containerized API to allow fast, automatic extraction and transferring of data from scanned medical forms into databases using OCR. This reduced the processing time of medical data intake of patients by over 90%. Used Python, Flask, Google Cloud Vision API, Google Cloud Storage, and Docker.

work.title: Robotics and Beyond
work.description: Taught elementary school students basic Python skills, Developed and taught a course in AI with Edge Computers and TensorFlow Lite to high school students, developed and taught a course in Tensorflow, SKLearn, and Machine Learning to high school students.
